constraints.name: digit_set_constraint
constraints.description: 数字只能由特定的数位组成（1, 4, 5）

constraints.name: modular_zero_constraint
constraints.description: 数字在模 p 意义下为 0

constraints.name: length_constraint
constraints.description: 数字的长度必须为 n

constraints.name: availability_constraint
constraints.description: 使用的每个数位的数量不能超过初始数量
constraints.formal: count(1) ≤ a_1, count(4) ≤ a_4, count(5) ≤ a_5
